Class TetrisBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • TetrisBoard

  • public class TetrisBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the location of the blocks on the board and the location of the TetrisPiece. Randomly chooses new TetrisPieces to be created. Checks if moves are possible and executes some moves. Checks if there is a block at a specific row and column. Adds pieces to the board array when they reach the bottom of the board.

        public TetrisBoard()
        Constructor. Initializes board. Adds a new TetrisPiece and initializes the array that tells where the piece is.

      • checkLanded

        public boolean checkLanded()
        Checks if a piece is at the lowest point it can go.
        Returns:
        true if there is a collision, false otherwise

      • fullLine

        public boolean fullLine(int row)
        Checks to see if a row is full or not.
        Parameters:
        row - the row being tested
        Returns:
        true if the row is complete, false otherwise

      • hasBlock

        public boolean hasBlock(int row,
                        int col)
        Checks if there is a block in the board or in the TetrisPiece at a location in the board.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the cell being tested
        col - the column of the cell being tested
        Returns:
        true if there is a block, false if there isn't

      • landPiece

        public void landPiece()
        Adds the TetrisPiece blocks to the board array.

      • removeRow

        public void removeRow(int row)
        Removes every block in a completed row and moves everything else above this row down one.
        Parameters:
        row - the row being checked
